title: Define Quantum Algorithm Architecture
description: Design the architecture and data structures for implementing various quantum algorithms.

title: Develop Quantum Circuit Simulation Engine
description: Create a quantum circuit simulation engine capable of handling various quantum gates and operations.

title: Implement Basic Quantum Algorithms
description: Write code for implementing basic quantum algorithms like Quantum Fourier Transform (QFT), Deutsch-Jozsa, and Grover's algorithm.

title: Design and Develop User Interface for Algorithm Selection
description: Create a user-friendly interface to allow users to select the desired quantum algorithm.

title: Integrate User Interface with Backend Simulation Engine
description: Connect the user interface created in Task 4 with the backend simulation engine to execute quantum algorithms.
dependencies: Design and Develop User Interface for Algorithm Selection

title: Perform Unit Testing on the Implemented Quantum Algorithms
description: Write unit tests to ensure that implemented quantum algorithms return correct outputs and handle edge cases.

title: Review and Refactor the Implemented Codebase
description: Review, refactor, and optimize the codebase for better performance and maintainability.
